com.communote.server.api.core.blog

Interface BlogManagement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlogManagementBase, BlogManagementImpl

    public interface BlogManagement
    Service for retrieving, creating, updating and removing blogs/topics.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String PROPERTY_KEY_PERSONAL_TOPIC_USER_ID
      Key of the property which marks a topic as the personal topic of a user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Blog createBlog(CreationBlogTO blogDetails)
      Create a new blog and set the user referenced in the transfer object as its manager.

      Create a default topic if there is no such topic yet.

      Delete a blog with all its notes

      Delete a selection of blogs.

      Removes "all read" and "all write" permissions from all blogs.

    • Field Detail

      • PROPERTY_KEY_PERSONAL_TOPIC_USER_ID

        static final String PROPERTY_KEY_PERSONAL_TOPIC_USER_ID
        Key of the property which marks a topic as the personal topic of a user. The property value holds the ID of the user/owner of the personal topic.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • createBlog

        Blog createBlog(CreationBlogTO blogDetails)
         throws NonUniqueBlogIdentifierException,
                BlogIdentifierValidationException,
                BlogNotFoundException,
                BlogAccessException
        Create a new blog and set the user referenced in the transfer object as its manager. The all-can access rights will set if the client configuration allows this.
        Parameters:
        blogDetails - transfer object holding the details of the blog to be created
        Throws:
        NonUniqueBlogIdentifierException - in case the blog alias is not unique
        BlogIdentifierValidationException - in case the blog alias is not valid
        BlogAccessException - in case the current user is not manager of the topic that should be added as the parent topic
        BlogNotFoundException - in case the topic to be added as the parent topic does not exist

      • createDefaultBlog

        void createDefaultBlog(String blogName)
                throws NonUniqueBlogIdentifierException,
                       BlogIdentifierValidationException
        Create a default topic if there is no such topic yet.
        Parameters:
        blogName - the name of the topic to create
        Throws:
        NonUniqueBlogIdentifierException - in case the blog alias of the default blog is not unique
        BlogIdentifierValidationException - in case the blog alias of the default blog is not valid

      • deleteBlog

        void deleteBlog(Long blogId,
                Long newBlogId)
         throws NoteManagementAuthorizationException,
                BlogNotFoundException
        Delete a blog with all its notes
        Parameters:
        blogId - The ID of the blog to delete
        newBlogId - An optional ID of a blog to move the notes to before deleting the blog
        Throws:
        BlogNotFoundException - if the blog to delete does not exist
        NoteManagementAuthorizationException - if the current user is not manager of the blog to delete

      • deleteBlogs

        void deleteBlogs(Long[] blogIds)
          throws AuthorizationException
        Delete a selection of blogs. The current user must be client manager or manager of all the blogs for this operation to succeed.
        Parameters:
        blogIds - The IDs of the blogs to delete
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - if the current user is not client manager or the manager of all the blogs

      • findBlogByIdentifier

        Blog findBlogByIdentifier(String identifier)
                   throws BlogAccessException
        Retrieve a blog by its alias. Throws an authorization exception if the current user does not have read access to the blog.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the name identifier/alias of the blog
        Returns:
        the blog or null if there is no such blog
        Throws:
        BlogAccessException - in case the current user has no read access to the topic

      • findBlogByIdentifierWithoutAuthorizationCheck

        Blog findBlogByIdentifierWithoutAuthorizationCheck(String alias)
        Retrieve a blog by its alias. It is not checked whether the current user has read access to the blog.
        Parameters:
        alias - the name identifier/alias of the blog
        Returns:
        the blog or null if there is no such blog

      • findBlogByIdWithoutAuthorizationCheck

        Blog findBlogByIdWithoutAuthorizationCheck(Long blogId)
        Retrieve a blog by its ID. It is not checked whether the current user has read access to the blog.
        Parameters:
        blogId - the ID of the blog
        Returns:
        the blog or null if there is no such blog

      • findBlogsById

        List<Blog> findBlogsById(Long[] blogIds)
        Return the blogs for the given IDs. Topics that do not exist or the user is not allowed to read will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        blogIds - the IDs of the blogs to retrieve
        Returns:
        the found blogs

      • generateUniqueBlogAlias

        String generateUniqueBlogAlias(String aliasBase,
                               String previousAlias)
                        throws NonUniqueBlogIdentifierException
        Tries to find a valid blog alias that is not yet used by another blog
        Parameters:
        aliasBase - the alias value to start with. If this value is not a valid alias, it will be converted into a valid string.
        previousAlias - if this alias is generated it will not be considered as a duplicate. Providing this value is especially useful when generating an alias for a blog update. Can be null.
        Returns:
        a proposal for the blog alias which might match the previousAlias if given
        Throws:
        NonUniqueBlogIdentifierException - in case no unique identifier could be generated

      • getBlogByAlias

        <T> T getBlogByAlias(String alias,
                     Converter<Blog,T> converter)
              throws BlogAccessException
        Return the details of a blog. The data of the blog will be converted with the provided converter and the resulting object will be returned. In case there is no blog for the ID null is returned. In case the current user has no access to the blog an exception will be thrown.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the resulting object
        Parameters:
        alias - the alias of the topic
        converter - the converter to use for creating the result object
        Returns:
        the blog data or null if there is no matching topic
        Throws:
        BlogAccessException - in case the current user has no access to the topic

      • getBlogById

        Blog getBlogById(Long topicId,
                 boolean needTags)
          throws BlogNotFoundException,
                 BlogAccessException
        Retrieve a blog by its ID.
        Usually getBlogById(Long, Converter) should be used instead.
        Parameters:
        topicId - the ID of the blog
        needTags - If true tags will also be loaded.
        Returns:
        the topic
        Throws:
        BlogAccessException - in case the current user has no read access to the topic
        BlogNotFoundException - in case the topic does not exist

      • getBlogById

        <T> T getBlogById(Long blogId,
                  Converter<Blog,T> converter)
           throws BlogAccessException
        Return the details of a blog. The data of the blog will be converted with the provided converter and the resulting object will be returned. In case there is no blog for the ID null is returned. In case the current user has no access to the blog an exception will be thrown.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the resulting object
        Parameters:
        blogId - the ID of the blog
        converter - the converter to use for creating the result object
        Returns:
        the blog data
        Throws:
        BlogAccessException - in case the current user has no access to the topic

      • getBlogCount

        long getBlogCount()
        Returns:
        the number of blogs

      • getBlogId

        Long getBlogId(String alias)
        Get the ID of a topic identified by the alias. The access to the topic is not checked.
        Parameters:
        alias - the alias of the topic
        Returns:
        the ID of the topic or null if the topic does not exist

      • getLastUsedBlogs

        List<BlogData> getLastUsedBlogs(int numberOfMaxResults,
                                boolean sortByTitle)
        Retrieve a collection of the writable blogs the current user has written to. The blogs are sorted by the creation date of the notes where the blogs with the latest note are on top.
        Parameters:
        numberOfMaxResults - The maximal number of blogs to return
        sortByTitle - If true, the result will be sorted by title.
        Returns:
        the sorted blog collection

      • getMinimalBlogInfo

        MinimalBlogData getMinimalBlogInfo(Long blogId)
        Return the minimal set of information on a blog, even if the current user is not allowed to read it.
        Parameters:
        blogId - the ID of the topic
        Returns:
        the info on the topic

      • getMostUsedBlogs

        List<BlogData> getMostUsedBlogs(int numberOfMaxResults,
                                boolean sortByTitle)
        Retrieve a collection of writable blogs the current user has written to. The collection is sorted by the number of created notes in descending order.
        Parameters:
        numberOfMaxResults - The maximal number of blogs to return
        sortByTitle - If true, the result will be sorted by title.
        Returns:
        the collection of blogs

      • resetGlobalPermissions

        void resetGlobalPermissions()
        Removes "all read" and "all write" permissions from all blogs.

      • updateBlog

        Blog updateBlog(Long blogId,
                BlogTO blogDetails)
         throws NonUniqueBlogIdentifierException,
                BlogIdentifierValidationException,
                BlogAccessException
        Update the blog data including title, description alias, tags and properties but not access rights. If the blog to update does not exist nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        blogId - ID of the blog to update
        blogDetails - transfer object holding the details of the blog to be updated
        Returns:
        the updated blog
        Throws:
        NonUniqueBlogIdentifierException - in case the new blog alias is not unique
        BlogIdentifierValidationException - in case the new blog alias is not valid
        BlogAccessException - in case the current user has not the required permission to update the blog
